description:
Ashen Eye is a very old Faerie. Underneath the shroud, he has 3 eyes, with spiraling pupils.
Ashen Eye has a perplexing relationship with humans, taking interest in the fleeting nature of a human life in comparison to a Neighbor`s. He cherishes the moment a child becomes an adult, but also takes pleasure out of seeing a human shaken to the core of their soul.
Source: Mahou Tsukai no Yome Wiki
name: Hai no Me
